However, upon returning last night, I realized that wasnâ€™t the case at all. My tiny reverse proxy, Caddy, had encountered an issue during an automated security upgrade.

item.description: On my list of â€˜things to sortâ€™ is a bunch of files and physical documents that we’re compelled to move from place to place as we relocate every few years. I’ve been considering getting a document scanner to digest these files digitally and get rid of them. It’s been on my mind for a few years now and I think I’ve reached that decision threshold to bite the bullet and get a scanner. Now these devices run anywhere between 200 and 600 USD that I am NOT interested in spending for this indulgence. I’ll most likely hunt for one on ebay or backmarket sticking to my recycled hardware whenever feasible stand. The Fujitsu Fi 6130 seems to fit that ‘cheap and best’ bucket if sourced second hand. item.title: 13 Jan 2025 06:30
item.description: Around 0300 today, I was woken up rudely to a blaring sound. For a moment I assumed it was from the Seismic City alert system that CDMX has. Turned out, it was from the old blue dell laptop that I currently use to run NextcloudPi. For some reason, looks like it rebooted and went into a huge panic mode because it lost time sync. Yanked all the cables and shut it down. Something to figure out over the next few days when I have time. ðŸ”—

item.title: 29 Nov 2024 22:41
item.description: Just struck me that most of my disk drives are quite old. Almost all of them were salvaged from old laptops. Age does not necessarily equate to performance and I do have decent backups, but only a question of time before I see them going kaput. Living vicariously on the edge when it comes to self-hosting!

item.title: 06 Jan 2024 00:00
item.description: Bought a desk organizer a few weeks ago to arrange all my micro systems. The NUC, RPi NCP, Odroid and routers all now sit neatly in one space. The sliding shelves are an added bonus and the open back and sides give a lot of space for air circulation and cable management.
